title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.18 - Charges-credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.18 - Charges-credit

State Regulations

Owners or operators of watercraft desiring to open credit
accounts must make arrangements therefor with the treasurer of the Port

Authority. Unless such a credit account is in effect, the owner or operator of
the watercraft must pay all charges for mooring watercraft in cash each day at
the office of the manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
